ref.Programmability.Name: ExpectedOutComes_ApprovedData
ref.Programmability.CreateCommand:
CREATE FUNCTION [sbor].[ExpectedOutComes_ApprovedData] (@idProgram int, @datestate nvarchar(128), @idVersion int, @idPublicLegalFormation int) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( --DECLARE @idProgram int, @idPublicLegalFormation int, @idVersion int --SET @idPublicLegalFormation = 1 --SET @idVersion = 1 --SET @idProgram = 293; SELECT TAB.Goalindicator ,TAB.Viewprog ,TAB.UnitDimension ,CASE WHEN IndicatedCumulatively = 1 THEN ValueCumulatively WHEN (IndicatedCumulatively = 0 OR IndicatedCumulatively IS NULL) THEN Value END AS Value FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN prg.IdDocType = -1543503843 THEN 'ГОСУДАРСТВЕННОЙ ПРОГРАММЫ' WHEN prg.IdDocType = -1543503841 THEN 'ВЕДОМСТВЕННОЙ ЦЕЛЕВОЙ ПРОГРАММЫ' WHEN prg.IdDocType = -1543503837 THEN 'ДОЛГОСРОЧНОЙ ЦЕЛЕВОЙ ПРОГРАММЫ' WHEN prg.IdDocType = -1543503842 THEN 'ПОДПРОГРАММЫ' END AS Viewprog ,gi.Caption AS Goalindicator ,ud.Symbol AS UnitDimension ,gi.IndicatedCumulatively AS IndicatedCumulatively --Флаг ,Value = ( SELECT TOP 1 vgt.Value FROM [reg].ValuesGoalTarget As vgt LEFT JOIN [ref].HierarchyPeriod As hp --период(справочник) ON hp.Id = vgt.IdHierarchyPeriod --значение целевых показателей(register) AND vgt.idTerminator is null AND vgt.idVersion = @idVersion AND vgt.idPublicLegalFormation = @idPublicLegalFormation AND vgt.DateCommit <= ISNULL((convert(datetime,@datestate,104)),dateadd(d,+1,vgt.DateCommit)) AND vgt.DateCommit IS NOT NULL AND (vgt.DateTerminate > (convert(datetime,@datestate,104)) or vgt.idTerminator is null)--по утвержденным данным WHERE vgt.idGoalTarget = gt.id AND hp.DateEnd = aop.DateEnd ) ,ValueCumulatively = (
SELECT SUM(vgt.Value) FROM [reg].ValuesGoalTarget As vgt WHERE vgt.idGoalTarget = gt.id AND vgt.idTerminator is null AND vgt.idVersion = @idVersion AND vgt.idPublicLegalFormation = @idPublicLegalFormation AND vgt.DateCommit <= ISNULL((convert(datetime,@datestate,104)),dateadd(d,+1,vgt.DateCommit)) AND vgt.DateCommit IS NOT NULL AND (vgt.DateTerminate > (convert(datetime,@datestate,104)) or vgt.idTerminator is null)--по утвержденным данным GROUP BY idGoalTarget ) FROM reg.AttributeOfProgram AS aop INNER JOIN reg.SystemGoalElement AS sge ON aop.IdGoalSystemElement = sge.Id AND aop.IdProgram = @idProgram AND aop.IdPublicLegalFormation = @idPublicLegalFormation AND aop.IdVersion = @idVersion AND aop.IdTerminator is null AND aop.DateCommit <= ISNULL((convert(datetime,@datestate,104)),dateadd(d,+1,aop.DateCommit)) AND aop.DateCommit IS NOT NULL AND (aop.DateTerminate > (convert(datetime,@datestate,104)) or aop.idTerminator is null) AND sge.idTerminator is null AND sge.IdPublicLegalFormation = @idPublicLegalFormation AND sge.IdVersion = @idVersion AND sge.DateCommit <= ISNULL((convert(datetime,@datestate,104)),dateadd(d,+1,sge.DateCommit)) AND sge.DateCommit IS NOT NULL AND (sge.DateTerminate > (convert(datetime,@datestate,104)) or sge.idTerminator is null)--по утвержденным данным INNER JOIN reg.Program AS prg ON aop.IdProgram = prg.Id AND prg.idTerminator is null AND prg.IdPublicLegalFormation = @idPublicLegalFormation AND prg.IdVersion = @idVersion AND prg.DateCommit <= ISNULL((convert(datetime,@datestate,104)),dateadd(d,+1,prg.DateCommit)) AND prg.DateCommit IS NOT NULL AND (prg.DateTerminate > (convert(datetime,@datestate,104)) or prg.idTerminator is null)--по утвержденным данным INNER JOIN reg.GoalTarget AS gt ON sge.Id = gt.IdSystemGoalElement AND gt.IdPublicLegalFormation = @idPublicLegalFormation AND gt.IdVersion = @idVersion AND gt.IdTerminator is null AND gt.DateCommit <= ISNULL((convert(datetime,@datestate,104)),dateadd(d,+1,gt.DateCommit)) AND gt.DateCommit IS NOT NULL AND (gt.DateTerminate > (convert(datetime,@datestate,104)) or gt.idTerminator is null)--по утвержденным данным INNER JOIN reg.ValuesGoalTarget AS gtv ON gt.Id = gtv.IdGoalTarget AND gtv.IdValueType = 1 AND gtv.IdPublicLegalFormation = @idPublicLegalFormation AND gtv.IdVersion = @idVersion AND gtv.IdTerminator is null AND gtv.DateCommit <= ISNULL((convert(datetime,@datestate,104)),dateadd(d,+1,gtv.DateCommit)) AND gtv.DateCommit IS NOT NULL AND (gtv.DateTerminate > (convert(datetime,@datestate,104)) or gtv.idTerminator is null)--по утвержденным данным INNER JOIN ref.HierarchyPeriod AS hp ON gtv.IdHierarchyPeriod = hp.Id AND aop.DateEnd = hp.DateEnd INNER JOIN ref.GoalIndicator AS gi ON gt.IdGoalIndicator = gi.Id INNER JOIN ref.UnitDimension AS ud ON gi.IdUnitDimension = ud.Id ) AS TAB )
